Object Shape: Circle, Cylinder, Disc, Fireball, Oval, Sphere
trends: There have been 17 other sightings in San Bernardino
There were no other sightings in San Bernardino on or around October 29th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsIn my backyard stargazing specifically the moon, after about an hour looking through my telescope i notice two objects slowly approaching the top edge of the moon. Because i was staring at the bright moon for a while my eye sight was a little sore. But i could see two white objects one larger than the other, they were moving slowly so i took out my galaxy phone and took a steady as i could picture. I couldn't see anything on the phone at the time so about a week later a went over my phone pictures to discovered i could see the objects, and to my amazement one of them was clearly blue in color. I transferred the picture to my computer and enhance it with photoshop and to my again amazement you can see a perfect saucer shape object. This was the smaller one the larger one was a round ball with what looks like a line going through it. You have to see it to believe it, this is a very extraordinary photo. please call me i haven't showed this to anybody, and am very excited as i am very open minded.
Summary: Looking at the moon at 7:19pm two objects one smaller than the other could be seen through my telescope.
